#labels Featured
== How to install the buildout (without google id) ==

   * svn co http://easyshop-for-plone.googlecode.com/svn/buildout/3.0-Anonymous/ es.buildout
   * cd es.buildout
   * python bootstrap.py
   * bin/buildout -v
   * bin/instance fg

== How to install the buildout (with google id) ==

   * svn co http://easyshop-for-plone.googlecode.com/svn/buildout/3.0/ es.buildout
   * cd es.buildout
   * python bootstrap.py
   * bin/buildout -v
   * bin/instance fg
